alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 11:01PM CDT until May 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Freestone County in central Texas... Henderson County in central Texas... Northern Anderson County in central Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1101 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Athens to 6 miles northwest of Fairfield Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palestine, Athens, Chandler, Malakoff, Frankston, Brownsboro, Berryville, Trinidad, Edom, Lake Palestine, Forest Grove Reservoir, Montalba, Coon Creek Lake, Fairfield Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Brushy Creek, Cross Roads, Log Cabin and Murchison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
